item.description:
This coming Wednesday (Sep. 22th) will be our mid-autumn day. For people who like Chinese food, want to learn more Chinese culture, and meet friends, we will have something fun instead of our regular Wednesday night study event. We will have dinner at Taiwan Cafe at 6:30pm and go somewhere around, like Boston Commons to enjoy the moon and have mooncake. Bring your friends, and come by, relax, practice in either language of your choice, and celebrate one of our biggest holidays in China.

Location:
New Shanghai Chinese Restaurant
21 Hudson St.
Boston, MA 02111


Time:
6:30pm, September 22th
item.how_to_find_us: ask front dest where is chinese speaker meetup group!

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Celebration of Mid-autumn Festival Dinner Table
